attributes.action: introduce constitutional amendments to bring real democracy to Britain and empowerment to the people,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: firstly, by passing control of the Constitution to the people, and secondly, by ensuring that elected representatives actually do represent their constituencies, that is, in going about their parliamentary duties, they act at all times in the honest belief that their actions would have the approval of the majority of their constituents.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
